tool_description: Creates comprehensive photographic documentation of returned items for record-keeping, quality assurance, and dispute resolution.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the item being documented

photographer_id.description: ID of staff member taking photos

documentation_type.description: Type of documentation: standard, damage_focused, completeness_check, dispute_evidence

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Item ID must be non-empty string.
Invalid photographer_id: Must be valid staff member ID.
Invalid photo_count: Must be integer between 1-20.
Invalid documentation_type: Must be one of [standard, damage_focused, completeness_check, dispute_evidence].
Invalid timestamp: Must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Photo upload failed: Unable to save documentation photos.
usage: Use during or immediately after item inspection to create visual record. Essential for high-value items or disputed returns.

documentation_id.description: Unique identifier for the photo documentation set

documentation_complete.description: Whether all required photos were successfully captured
